name: Kids Coloring Book For Alphabets
description:
Alphabets Kids Coloring book with unique designs and Alphabets in all sorts of shapes and sizes. Get a fascinating stress reliever right on your Phone!
Release the stress and feel better: allow yourself some precious moments of childish joy and happiness and unleash your creative inner genius with these vibrant and harmonic Alphabets coloring pages!
Kids Coloring Book For Alphabets is a true coloring book with intricate patterns and coloring pages with Alphabets. The app magically translates the tactile pleasure of putting pencil, crayon or paintbrush to paper and turn your Phone into a perfect tool to relax and sharpen your drawing skills.

Time to Bring Alphabets Art into Your Life:
- A great variety of Alphabets coloring pages: enjoy the rich collection of fascinating images of Alphabets that would be so relaxing to take the time to color;
- 25+ beautiful color palettes : choose one that fits best and fill a picture with colors from soft muted to lively dynamic;
- Post-editing effects: add vignetting or apply textures to turn your coloring picture into a ready-to-share work of art;
- Quick sharing: when finished just share your masterpieces with friends by email and on social networks;
Plunge into a meditative coloring and start your journey to the world of peace and harmony! With Coloring Book for Me you can easily unwind after a busy work day anytime, anywhere. The app offers a great variety of relaxing graphics.
Take a deep breath and relax with free coloring book on your Phone or upgrade to Premium version and get an unlimited access to a huge, constantly growing collection of wonderful coloring pictures without any ads and watermarks.

This game application is totally free for all user.
